models.name: Halloween Mickey Decoration Remix for MMU
models.description:
Thanks to hyojung0320 for their original model.  This remix adds a round base and ring suitable for multimaterial printing.  I've also included a complete stl that you can print by swapping colors at the correct layers.

This was printed using the Mosaic Palette 2 Pro.

models.name: Arduino Shield Case for ROHM Sensor Evaluation Kit
models.description:
This is a 2-part case for Arduino UNO with ROHM Sensor Evaluation Kit shield, ready to be 3D printed!

To complete the case, you will need the two 3D printed parts, 4 M3 bolts to mount the Arduino and another 4 to hold the case togeher.To improve the stability of sensors like accelerometer or magnetometer, each of the sensors can also be mounted with 2 additional M3 bolts.
models.description_html:

models.name: Ganz Schön Clever Dice Holders, Laser Cut
models.description:
Simple dice holders for Ganz Schön Clever. These are used to keep the dice in place during your turn, so that you don't accidentally flip a dice.

There are two types of holders:

* The short ones are used for the three dice that the active player choose.
* The longer ones is used as a sorting tray for the dice that the active player rolls. You can also use an additional one as a substitute for the silver tray (or use the tray model linked down below).

If you want a "real" tray for the dice, see:
https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3578415

For 3D Printable version, see:
https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3572798
